title: Embodied Language Learning through Urban Exploration: Learning Tourism Languages by Walking

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Experiential language learning combining physical urban spaces with digital tools. Parallel on-site tourism exploration and online/offline activities

learning_goals: Learners can orally utilize over 50 practical language expressions related to local tourist sites within two weeks.
Learners generate three or more creative language expressions based on sensory-based spatial observations during field trips.
Learners linguistically complete one tourist guide/information brochure through collaborative projects with peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
